review: Unit keeps,freezing/crashing. Netflix and Amazon prime tv keep acting up. The only fix is to clear cache and keep unplugging the unit. I'll stick to my reliable Appletv 3. The Fire tv needs desperate help if it wants to compete in a market of better products. Good luck Amazon
author: Joseph Amico

review: The Amazon Fire TV worked as promised.  It was easy to set-up and the voice command search works better than I expected.  I feel that it's kinda 'tuned' for Amazon streaming, which it does very well, but it works great on other services, too.  If you want to get into video streaming, the Amazon Fire is a great product.
